title: app/entityManagerParams
description: Additional entity parameters. Defined parameters are available in the entity manager. Global, template type and entity type specific parameters can be defined.

additionalProperties.description: A scope name. If starts with `@`, then a template name.

location.description: A metadata location. Where the parameter will be stored.

param.description: An actual parameter name in metadata. If omitted, the object item key will be used.

fieldDefs.description: Field definitions. The defined field will be rendered on the entity manager edit view.
